title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       There are plenty of nearby attractions for your visit to the area. Check out the provided links for more information. For a more exhaustive list of historic site and attractions, visit some of the tourism links at the bottom of the page. There are several National Park Service sites in the State of South Carolina: Charles Pinckney National Historic Site Mt.
